title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, May 17, 2020
description: On this day 16 years ago, Massachusetts became the first state to issue marriage licenses to same-sex couples.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day 16 years ago, Massachusetts became the first state to issue marriage licenses to same-sex couples.
